pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sparse Linear Method to Predict Ratings and Top-N Recommendations // Sparse Linear Method(SLIM) predicts ratings and top-n recommendations suited for sparse implicit positive feedback systems. SLIM is decomposed into multiple elasticnet optimization problems which are solved in parallel over multiple cores. The package is based on "SLIM: Sparse Linear Methods for Top-N Recommender Systems" by Xia Ning and George Karypis doi:10.1109/ICDM.2011.134.
